pullrequest.title: Restore ODELink ABI, use Link variables instead (#1354)

content.raw:
static variables? I think there were cases where we used static variables to fix ABI. Anyways, reusing variables look ok to me. 

Maybe add some comments as a reminder to not merge these changes forward?
